TEST_NAME: IR Column links should have aria and title
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapic as (select case
                     when column_link is not null and ((lower(trim(column_link_attr)) not like '%aria-%'
                            and lower(trim(column_link_attr)) not like '%title%')
                            or trim(column_link_attr) is null) then 'N' 
                     when html_expression is not null and lower(trim(html_expression)) like '%<a%' then 'N' 
                     else 'Y'
                   end pass_yn,
                   page_id,
                   application_id,
                   column_link_attr,
                   html_expression,
                   created_by,
                   created_on,
                   updated_by,
                   updated_on,
                   build_option,
                   display_text_as,
                   report_label,
                   column_alias,
                   column_id,
							     workspace
             from apex_application_page_ir_col
             where  (column_link is not null
                 or html_expression is not null))
select aapic.pass_yn,                          
       aapic.application_id, 
       aapic.page_id,
       aapic.created_by,
       aapic.created_on,
       aapic.updated_by last_updated_by,
       aapic.updated_on last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Report Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) link is missing title & aria (attr `%3`, html `%4`)', 
        p0 => aapic.column_alias, 
        p1 => aapic.application_id,
        p2 => aapic.page_id,
				p3 => aapic.column_link_attr,
			  p4 => aapic.html_expression) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Report Column `%0` link is missing title & aria (app %1, page %2, colum id %3)', 
        p0 => aapic.column_alias, 
        p1 => aapic.application_id,
        p2 => aapic.page_id,
				p3 => aapic.column_id) issue_title,
       aapic.column_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapic.column_alias,
       aapic.report_label,
       aapic.display_text_as,
			 aapic.column_link_attr,
			 aapic.html_expression,
			 aapic.workspace
from aapic
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapic.page_id and aap.application_id = aapic.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapic.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapic.application_id
where aapic.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION:
This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :
  1. 2.4.4(A) : Link Purpose (In Context) : The purpose of each link can be determined from the link text alone or from the link text together with its programmatically determined link context, except where the purpose of the link would be ambiguous to users in general.
